name: @icure/typescript-common
author: iCure
description: Common typescript code for iCure projects

scripts.prepare: rimraf dist && yarn run build && jq '{name:.name, version:.version, description:.description, main:"index.js", types:"index.d.ts", dependencies:.dependencies, author:.author, license:.license, bugs:.bugs, homepage:.homepage}' < package.json > dist/package.json
scripts.publish: yarn run prepare && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
